resources.string: Sorry, this puzzle impossible to solve :(
The app checks that every row, column and 3x3 square has no duplicate numbers, and if there are such errors, display them on a red background

Step-by-step solving:
 First, The app looks through all empty cells and enters all possible (green) and impossible (red) numbers
 Second, the application searches in empty cells when 8 digits are impossible, so the rest is a "solution"
 The result is shown to you. All changed cells have a yellow background
 If you click again and again, the previous logic stops working, since nothing can be changed, and the application starts to "guess":
 It chooses the cell with the smallest number of "possible" digits and chooses the first one as a "guess",
 then it does the First and Second steps
 "Guess" is displayed as a red digit, other "possible" digits are also displayed, but all "impossible" digits are hidden
 If the “guess” was wrong, the next possible digit is displayed as “guess”
Same as above, but do it until complete solution or error
It finishes filling out an empty Sudoku\nAfter this step you can start to solve Sudoku
To enter a "solution" digit if you are sure that it is correct
To enter a "guess" digit if you are NOT sure that it is correct\n Good practice is choosing a "guess" digit from "possible" ones
To enter "impossible" digits\n Look which digits are displayed in the same row where your empty cell placed and enter those digits as impossible\n Repeat for the same column and 3x3 square
To enter "possible" digits\n The opposite operation described in "impossible" above
